name: A Mazing Game
description:
This a Unity project that I did as an assignment for one of my college courses.

To spawn enemies into the maze:

- 1 key : spawns an enemy that moves one tile at a time

- 2 key: spawns an enemy that moves in one direction until it hits a wall.

You can only spawn three enemies in one maze

To generate a different maze, press the "F1" key.
